message: You're in luck! I have a top-of-the-line product that has been highly sought after by many of my discerning customers. With a proven track record of success and a reputation for excellence, I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Would you like to take a chance on this exceptional opportunity?
I'd like to pass on this one, thank you. I'd like to see some sales data before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation! As a seasoned seller, I've had the pleasure of working with many satisfied customers. In fact, I've sold 5 high-quality products out of the 8 I've offered so far, with a 100% satisfaction rate. I'm confident that this product will continue that trend. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity to join the ranks of my happy customers?

I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that the 100% satisfaction rate is based on the first 5 sales, and there's no information on the quality of the remaining 3 products. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd like to know that I'm not being misled.
